#6 14.09 /app/bin
#6 14.09 /app/bin/libcoolbpf.so.1.0.0
#6 14.09 /app/bin/libdcgm.so
#6 14.09 /app/bin/ilogtaild

#6 14.09 /app/bin/libGoPluginBase.so

#6 14.09 /app/bin/loongcollector_3.2.4
#6 14.09 /app/bin/checkingtool.sh
#6 14.09 /app/bin/libeBPFDriver.so

docker run -d -v=/:/logtail_host:ro -v=/var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock ALIYUN_LOGTAIL_USER_ID=50164576 -e=ALIYUN_LOGTAIL_USER_DEFINED_ID=docker tianxiadys/loongcollector:3.2.4-3

curl http://100.100.100.200/latest/meta-data/region-id
curl http://100.100.100.200/latest/meta-data/owner-account-id
